short_summary: Hose Assembly and Gasket Seal Set
description: The document provides details for 2 NSN (W8482-230760) contracts to be awarded, with the procurement method being competitive open bidding. Invitations will only be accepted for bids in Canadian currency. The successful bidder must prove meeting the specifications of the first 20 units of the purchase order.
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement 
#### Hose Assembly & Gasket Seal Set
#### W8482-230760/A

**Tender Details**

*   Tender Title: Hose Assembly & Gasket Seal Set (W8482-230760/A)
*   Reference Number: PW-22-01006970
*   Amendment Number: 3
*   Solicitation Number: W8482-230760/A
*   Publication Date: September 13, 2022
*   Closing Date: October 13, 2022 (at 14:00)
*   Amendment Date: October 06, 2022
*   Tender Status: Expired
*   Region of Opportunity: Canada

**Background**

The Department of National Defence is soliciting proposals from qualified suppliers for the provision of the following items:

*   Item 1: GSIN N5330, NSN 5330-01-574-6737(Gasket and Seal Set)
*   Item 2: GSIN N5330, NSN 5330-01-574-6737(Gasket and Seal Set)
*   Item 3: GSIN N4720, NSN 4720-01-616-3515 (Hose Assembly, Nonmetallic)
*   Item 4: GSIN N4720, NSN 4720-01-616-3515 (Hose Assembly, Nonmetallic)

Delivery will be made to the Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Halifax and CFB Esquimalt. All bids must be submitted in Canadian currency.

A detailed specification sheet is provided for each item, outlining the required parts and quantities. The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

### Tender Requirements
Bidders are required to provide:

*   The brand name and model, or part number, and NCAGE of the proposed product
*   Proof of currency (CAD)
*   A completed tender application
*   Any additional documentation as specified

Tenders may be submitted in either English or French.

### Contact Information

Contact details for Michael Dettorre, procurement officer:

*   Email: [MICHAEL.DETTORRE@FORCES.GC.CA](mailto:MICHAEL.DETTORRE@FORCES.GC.CA)
*   Address: 455 Boul de la Carrière, Gatineau Qc J8Y 6V7

Attachments:
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub
